Name: Spider Plant
CareTips: Remove dead leaves and avoid overwatering.
Ensure good drainage to prevent root rot.
Consider occasional repotting to promote healthy growth.

Name: Snake Plant
CareTips: Allow soil to dry out between waterings.
Avoid placing in direct sunlight to prevent leaf burn.
Wipe leaves occasionally to remove dust and keep them glossy.

Name: Peace Lily
Watering: When the top inch of soil is dry
CareTips: Keep away from drafts and fertilize monthly.
Provide additional humidity in dry environments.
Prune dead or yellowing leaves to encourage new growth.

Name: Boston Fern
CareTips: Maintain high humidity and provide regular misting.
Place in a bathroom or kitchen where humidity is naturally higher.
Remove brown or dead fronds to promote fresh growth.

Name: ZZ Plant
CareTips: Allow soil to dry out completely between waterings.
Keep away from cold drafts and extreme temperatures.
Occasionally clean leaves to prevent dust buildup.
